Or, maybe he was a guy in the way to the grocery store who saw a suspicious character lurking around an area that has had multiple burglaries? I carry concealed so I would have been armed, too.
I would have called the police and reported him but not followed him I wouldn't want to take a bullet from a petty criminal that is where GZ erred. TM could easily have been a little gangbanger with a Glock.
Hero complex? He was having his head smashed into the sidewalk I would have shot TM as well. I helped you with your post:
Martin was a black teenager walking home from a store with a bag of candy - don't forget the iced tea!
Zimmerman is a white, unauthorized' 'self-appointed Community Watch captain, on patrol' - Zimmerman was on his way to grocery store when he Spotted TM whom he did not recognize
Zimmerman was armed with a deadly weapon which is against Community Watch policy - Looks like this saved his life
Zimmerman was patrolling alone, which is also against Community Watch policy - Was not patrolling, was going to store
Zimmerman was instructed by police to not follow nor approach Martin, but did BOTH - Not true. Dispatch said "You don't need to do that" indicating safer to wait for patrol officer
Martin knew Zimmerman was following him and tried to avoid him - Motive? GZ may have assumed he was hiding something
Zimmerman and Martin intersected in some way - Obviously
Martin was killed with Zimmerman's gun - Obviously
Zimmerman's father is a retired judge in the same community - Relevance?
Zimmerman has multiple police records of violence, each inexplicably non prosecuted - Inexplicably? Tell me are you privy to facts of "incidents"? I didn't think so.
Martin has no record for violence, as in 'none' - Does have record of drug use and possible theft, two things GZ was wondering about TM
The Sanford police gathered evidence on and tested Martin - Plus autopsy and toxicology which has not been released
The Sanford police DID NOT gather evidence on nor test Zimmerman - Took his gun and clothes
Zimmerman claims injuries which are unverified since evidence was not collected - Eyewitness and police accounts back up GZ
Zimmerman shows no signs of injuries, grass or blood stains or a struggle in a police video shot shortly after the event - What? See above
Zimmerman claims protection under Florida's Stand Your Ground law - Self Defense is likely defense if TM was aggressor
Florida's Stand Your Ground law apparently does not apply on Martin's behalf - Depends on who was aggressor
The town of Sanford, Florida has a long and sordid history of racial unfairness - Hearsay; Sanford is a suburb of Orlando not some Mayberry hick town
The Sanford, Florida Police Department continues to 'leak' smearing 'intelligence' about Martin almost every day - Like the facts
Sorry for long post!
